news_header: Inflation decreased to 0.7% in January compared to last year.
news_original_title: Lainakorkojen lasku ja sähkön hinnat pitivät inflaation ennallaan
news_text: Inflation in January was 0.7%, down from 3.27% a year ago. Consumer prices rose due to hospital charges and heating costs. Underlying inflation was 1.3%, excluding volatile food and energy prices. Euro area inflation was 2.5%.
